events.name: What makes a game GAME? Game Industry Sharing
events.description: • What we'll doContent of the talk:The talk is one of the rare chances to get to know the gaming industry. For those who are passionate about games or considering gaming as a career.The talk will cover an overview of the gaming industry, including the different kinds of games, the game industry value chain, and the global market for games and its growth trends. Speaker Info:As a passionate gamer, Nick joined the game industry after graduating from NUS engineering faculty in 2013, and has since been working in one of the biggest game publishing firms in Singapore for almost 5 years. Through the years, Nick worked with various major game developers to bring their premium game titles on both PC and mobile platform to gamers in SEA and Taiwan, and hence developed strong understanding about the best practices to launch and operate different genre of games in the region. Nick is also an active follower of updates and trend in the global gaming industry. Favourite PC game: DOTA2;Favourite hero: Clockwerk;Favourite Mobile game: PUBG type mobile game;Favourite weapon: AK47;Favourite Console/Arcade game: King of Fighters;Favourite character: Iori Yagami. • What to bring • Important to know
events.location: National University of Singapore S17, 05-12, 10 Lower Kent Ridge Rd, National University of Singapore
events.group_name: Yidu AI Meetup (Previously Data Science Leap)
